mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_ebuy_advertise ea WHERE ea.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND (ea.f_link_url like '%/themeProductAd.%?advId=%' or ea.f_link_url like '%themeAdv/productList.html?advId=%')

select ps.f_id shelfId, p.f_id productId, p.f_name productName, esm.f_id merchantId,esm.f_name merchantName, dp.f_id dpId, concat('【',ss.f_name, '】', dp.f_name) dpName, ss.f_name ssName from t_ebuy_advertise ea inner JOIN t_ebuy_advertise_has_promote_shelf_product hsp on hsp.t_ebuy_advertise_f_id = ea.f_id and hsp.f_sys0_del_state = 0 left join t_ebuy_product_shelf ps on hsp.t_ebuy_product_shelf_f_id = ps.f_id and ps.f_sys0_del_state = 0 left JOIN t_ebuy_product p on ps.t_ebuy_product_id = p.f_id and p.f_sys0_del_state = 0 left JOIN t_ebuy_supply_merchant esm on p.t_supply_merchant_f_id = esm.f_id and esm.f_sys0_del_state = 0 left join t_dredge_product dp on dp.f_id = hsp.t_dredge_product_f_id left join t_service_supplier ss on ss.f_id = dp.f_service_supplier_id where ea.f_sys0_del_state = 0 and ea.f_id = #{advId}

SELECT sa.f_id id, ac.f_id cityId, ac.f_name cityName, gb.f_id gbId, gb.f_name gbName, gb.f_address_desc gbAddress, ab.f_id blockId, ab.f_name blockName FROM t_operation_sa_has_eb_supply hes LEFT JOIN t_operation_service_area sa on hes.f_sa_id = sa.f_id and sa.f_sys0_del_state = 0 LEFT JOIN t_address_block ab on sa.t_address_block_f_id = ab.f_id and ab.f_sys0_del_state = 0 LEFT JOIN t_address_city ac on sa.t_address_city_f_id = ac.f_id and ac.f_sys0_del_state = 0 LEFT JOIN t_group_building gb on sa.t_group_building_f_id = gb.f_id and gb.f_sys0_del_state = 0 WHERE hes.f_sys0_del_state = 0 and hes.f_type=#{advType} and hes.f_eb_supply_id = #{advId}
mapper.delete: delete from t_operation_sa_has_eb_supply where f_eb_supply_id = #{advId} and f_type=#{advType}

-- 首页弹窗广告、到家广告 SELECT ea.f_id AS id, ea.f_code AS `code`, ea.f_type AS `type`, ea.f_tittle as tittle, ea.f_pic_name AS picName, date_format(ea.f_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS startTime, date_format(ea.f_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS endTime, ea.f_order AS `order`, CASE WHEN now() < ea.f_start_time THEN 1 WHEN ea.f_start_time <= now() AND now() < ea.f_end_time THEN 2 ELSE 3 END AS `status`, IF ( ou1.f_real_name IS NULL OR ou1.f_real_name = '', ou1.f_user_account, ou1.f_real_name ) AS addMan, IF ( ou2.f_real_name IS NULL OR ou2.f_real_name = '', ou2.f_user_account, ou2.f_real_name ) AS updateMan, IF(ea.f_code = 'MAIN_BUSINESS_AD', 1, IF(ea.f_code = 'DREDGE_ACTIVITY_AD', 5, IF(ea.f_code = 'WX_STORE_ORDER_PUSH_AD', 6, if(ea.f_code = 'CAR_FEE_AD',7,if(ea.f_code = 'EXPERIENCE_STORE_AD',8,3))))) AS advType FROM t_ebuy_advertise ea LEFT JOIN t_oms_user ou1 ON ou1.f_id = ea.f_sys0_add_user LEFT JOIN t_oms_user ou2 ON ou2.f_id = ea.f_sys0_upd_user WHERE ea.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND (
ea.f_code = 'MAIN_BUSINESS_AD' or ea.f_code = 'WX' or ea.f_code = 'LA_WX' or ea.f_code = 'DREDGE_ACTIVITY_AD'
ea.f_code = 'MAIN_BUSINESS_AD'
ea.f_code = 'WX' or ea.f_code = 'LA_WX'
ea.f_code = 'DREDGE_ACTIVITY_AD'
ea.f_code = 'WX_STORE_ORDER_PUSH_AD'
ea.f_code = 'CAR_FEE_AD'
ea.f_code = 'EXPERIENCE_STORE_AD'
false
) AND ea.f_link_url NOT LIKE '%/themeProductAd.%?advId=%'
and ea.f_tittle like concat('%', #{advName}, '%')
and ea.f_start_time > now()
and ea.f_start_time <= now() and ea.f_end_time > now()
and ea.f_end_time < now()
and ea.f_start_time >= #{advStartTime}
and ea.f_end_time <= #{advEndTime}
and ea.f_code = #{advCode}
and ea.f_type = #{jumpType}
-- 首页拦腰广告 union SELECT ohst.f_id as id, ohst.f_code as `code`, ohst.f_data_type as `type`, ohst.f_name as `title`, ohst.f_icon_name as picName, date_format(ohst.f_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as startTime, date_format(ohst.f_end_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as endTime, ohst.f_order as `order`, CASE WHEN now() < ohst.f_start_time THEN 1 WHEN ohst.f_start_time <= now() AND now() < ohst.f_end_time THEN 2 ELSE 3 END AS `status`, IF ( ou1.f_real_name IS NULL OR ou1.f_real_name = '', ou1.f_user_account, ou1.f_real_name ) AS addMan, IF ( ou2.f_real_name IS NULL OR ou2.f_real_name = '', ou2.f_user_account, ou2.f_real_name ) AS updateMan, 2 AS advType from t_operation_home_supply_type ohst LEFT JOIN t_oms_user ou1 ON ou1.f_id = ohst.f_sys0_add_user LEFT JOIN t_oms_user ou2 ON ou2.f_id = ohst.f_sys0_upd_user WHERE 1=1 AND ohst.f_sys0_del_state=0 AND ohst.f_parent_id=701
AND false
and ohst.f_name like concat('%', #{advName}, '%')
and ohst.f_start_time > now()
and ohst.f_start_time <= now() and ohst.f_end_time > now()
and ohst.f_end_time < now()
and ohst.f_start_time >= #{advStartTime}
and ohst.f_end_time <= #{advEndTime}
and ohst.f_code = #{advCode}
and ohst.f_data_type=2
and ohst.f_data_type=3
and ohst.f_data_type=1
-- 街坊广告 union SELECT ca.f_id as id, null as `code`, null as `type`, ca.f_name as `title`, ca.f_icon as picName, date_format(ca.f_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as startTime, date_format(ca.f_end_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as endTime, ca.f_order as `order`, CASE WHEN now() < ca.f_start_time THEN 1 WHEN ca.f_start_time <= now() AND now() < ca.f_end_time THEN 2 ELSE 3 END AS `status`, IF ( ou1.f_real_name IS NULL OR ou1.f_real_name = '', ou1.f_user_account, ou1.f_real_name ) AS addMan, IF ( ou2.f_real_name IS NULL OR ou2.f_real_name = '', ou2.f_user_account, ou2.f_real_name ) AS updateMan, 4 AS advType from t_community_ads ca LEFT JOIN t_oms_user ou1 ON ou1.f_id = ca.f_sys0_add_user LEFT JOIN t_oms_user ou2 ON ou2.f_id = ca.f_sys0_upd_user WHERE 1=1 AND ca.f_sys0_del_state=0
AND false
and ca.f_name like concat('%', #{advName}, '%')
and ca.f_start_time > now()
and ca.f_start_time < now() and ca.f_end_time > now()
and ca.f_end_time < now()
and ca.f_start_time >= #{advStartTime}
and ca.f_end_time <= #{advEndTime}
and false
mapper.select: SELECT ,AB.f_name AS t_address_block , ac.f_name as t_address_city , ap.f_name as t_address_province , pc.f_name as propertyCompanyName , ac.f_id as cityId FROM t_group_building GB INNER JOIN t_address_block AB ON AB.f_id = GB.t_block_f_id AND AB.f_sys0_del_state = 0 inner join t_address_city ac on ac.f_id = AB.t_city_f_id and ac.f_sys0_del_state = 0 inner join t_address_province ap on ap.f_id = ac.t_province_f_id and ap.f_sys0_del_state = 0 inner join t_property_company pc on pc.f_id = GB.t_property_company_f_id LEFT JOIN t_oms_user OM ON OM.f_id = pc.f_admin_id WHERE 1=1 AND GB.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND GB.f_check_status=1 AND GB.f_sign_status=1
